translations: 支线；喂食器；奶瓶；饲养员；支流；让自己重复被对方玩家杀掉的玩家（游戏术语）

送丝器，钢索输送机；送丝装置

sentences.sentence: The feeder fed new feed to pigs so that they put on fat.
sentences.translation: 饲养员用新饲料喂猪使它们长胖。

sentences.sentence: Air India is one of only a handful of large airlines without a big domestic feeder airline.
sentences.translation: 印度航空是少数几家没有大型国内航空支线的大型航空公司之一。

sentences.sentence: The fish were placed in a tank with two feeders, one of which supplied a lot more food than the other, known as the "rich feeder".
sentences.translation: 这些鱼被安置在一个有两个喂食器的鱼缸里，其中一个喂食器提供的食物比另一个多得多，被称为“富庶喂食器”。
